p: The yellow-white embryogenic calli observed from water hyssop leaves explants were cultivated on the MS supplemented medium through NAA + KIN. The greatest somatic embryogenic callus, calli induction, development (84%) was obtained on 2,4-D + KIN (2.0 + 1.5 mg −1) amended solid medium, 84% somatic embryo formation was observed ( Fig. 2). After 30 d of background, the somatic embryos were separated and transferred to the regeneration medium. In MS medium augmented with KIN + 2,4-D (1.0 + 2.0 mg −1) showed (71%) ( Fig. 3).
